Uses of Class
graph.HGraph

  • Packages that use HGraph 
    Package Description
    graph
    graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
    graph.coarsening
    package defines abstract classes and implements algorithms for coarsening graphs.
    graph.partitioning
    Package defines interfaces and implements algorithms for graph and hyper-graph partitioning.
    utils
    utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.

      partitions is a Vector Each partition index starts at 1, and is in the range [1,k] inclusive.
      void SPPMakerIntf.createSPP(HGraph g, java.util.Vector partitions, int k, HObjFncIntf obj)
      creates an SPP problem to choose among the partition bloks the k ones that minimize the Obj Function described in obj
      int[] HPartitioner2LSPP.partition(HGraph g, int k, java.util.Hashtable props) 
      int[] HPartitionerGKW.partition(HGraph g, int k, java.util.Hashtable props)
      returns an array of size g.getNumNodes() with values in [1,...,k] implements the Greedy K-way partitioning scheme (simplification over F-M style algorithms since it visits nodes randomly and makes the best move iff it leads to a gain>0, in terms of weight of cut-edges.)
      int[] HPartitionerIntf.partition(HGraph g, int k, java.util.Hashtable properties)
      the method call will partition the graph g's nodes into k blocks.
      int[] HPartitionerMLSPP2.partition(HGraph g, int k, java.util.Hashtable props)
      the main class method.
      double HObjFncIntf.value(HGraph g, int[] partition)
      returns the overall value of the partitioning defined in the 2nd arg.
      double HObjFncSOED.value(HGraph g, int[] partition)
      returns the SOED of the entire partition
      double[] HObjFncIntf.values(HGraph g, int[] partition)
      returns the values of each partition of the partitioning defined in the 2nd argument.
      double[] HObjFncSOED.values(HGraph g, int[] partition)
      returns the SOED of each partition
